programme.title: Separation
programme.desc: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.

programme.title: A Bay of Blood
programme.desc: The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area.

programme.title: Asylum
programme.desc: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

programme.title: Deathcember
programme.desc: A collection of 24 films that take a look at the dark side of the festive season from international directors with the most diverse ideas and styles.

programme.title: The Monster Club
programme.desc: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him.

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a breakdown moves with her husband to a boys' school, and finds herself being terrorized.

programme.title: The Monster Club
programme.desc: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Satanic Rites Of Dracula
programme.desc: Elvira decides that the film she's hosting is so boring that she catches up on her reading and various personal chores.

programme.title: Hunchback Of The Morgue [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: A moronic hunchback employed in a hospital morgue is deeply in love with Ilse, but it's an ill-fated relationship.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Attack Of The Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A revamping, if you will, of the 1980's classic horror movie showcase, hosted by Elvira, Mistress of the Dark.

programme.desc: Spooky high jinks abound when Elvira finds herself spending the night in a mysterious castle.

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A physician discovers that two children are being kept virtually imprisoned in their house by their father.
